scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development HOST=172.18.1.82 PORT=3000 SERVER=dev nuxt
scripts.build-sit: cross-env NODE_ENV=production HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3333 SERVER=sit nuxt build
scripts.build-uat: cross-env NODE_ENV=production HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3333 SERVER=uat nuxt build
scripts.build-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3333 SERVER=prod nuxt build
scripts.start-sit: cross-env HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3333 SERVER=sit pm2 start ./node_modules/nuxt/bin/nuxt-start --instances 1 --name theme-fund
scripts.start-uat: cross-env HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3333 SERVER=uat pm2 start ./node_modules/nuxt/bin/nuxt-start --instances 1 --name theme-fund
scripts.start-prod: cross-env HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3333 SERVER=prod pm2 start ./node_modules/nuxt/bin/nuxt-start --instances 1 --name theme-fund
